value.title: POWERFUL storytelling technique in Power BI from STORYTELLING BY DATA book
value.excerpt: Have you read the book storytelling by data? It shows powerful techniques to grab the attention of the reader and convey insights faster and more effective, but how do we do that in Power BI?   Click play and let me show you!:)  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Schedule data downloads / exports in Power BI
value.excerpt: You can export data or download data out of Power BI in many different ways and depending on the source, you can schedule refresh those data dumps too. value.title: Scrape data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
